channel.title: [EASY] Clue Scrolls
channel.description:
The time starts from when I am in the H.A.M. cave until I steal a clue and complete it. P.S. You can receive Slayer Staves from pickpocketing H.A.M. members as a rare drop after the completion of the Buyers and Cellars quest and the following two capers. Slayer's Staff Total: 1 Total clue time: 28:30 minutes Total value: 119,682 Average clues per hour: 10.53 Average clue value: 23,936.4 gp Hourly profit: 251,962.11
Value: 4,692 Time: 6:51
Value: 37,260 Time: 5:47
Value: 47,040 Time: 5:09
Value: 29,123 Time: 5:34
Value: 1,567 Time: 5:09

item.title: [EASY] Clue Scrolls
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

I did this for a lil while for the god pages (how I lost my first rapier) and you can only do about 6 per hour. It takes 10mins to get the clue and complete it roughly… thats not inc time at g.e buying stuff. your math is wrong, it takes me about 1min to get a clue alone I’m 94 theiv.

The video speaks for itself.

Loveandpower:

I find this somewhat of a pointless log to be honest… it’s extremely easy to get scrolls from H.A.M. members unless they nerf the rate.

You can have your opinion. This log isn’t for you, it’s for me.

Read full topic

item.title: [EASY] Clue Scrolls
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Runeshark did a easy clue day the other day. BTW I think this is pointless, probably better of going for higher clues.
